verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> vai-yish-Kav slept יְהֽוֹשָׁפָט֙ <S%H3092><s%> ye-ho-sha-Fat Now Jehoshaphat עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tav, with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵ֥ר <S%H6912><s%> vai-yik-ka-Ver and was buried עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֲבֹתָ֖יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tav with his fathers בְּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> be-'Ir in the city דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; of David וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> vai-yim-Loch reigned יְהוֹרָ֥ם <S%H3088><s%> ye-ho-Ram And Jehoram בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tav. his place

וְלֽוֹ־ ve-lov- אַחִ֞ים <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chim And he had brethren בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons יְהוֹשָׁפָ֗ט <S%H3092><s%> ye-ho-sha-Fat, of Jehoshaphat עֲזַרְיָ֤ה <S%H5838><s%> 'a-zar-Yah Azariah וִֽיחִיאֵל֙ <S%H3171><s%> vi-chi-'El and Jehiel וּזְכַרְיָ֣הוּ <S%H2148><s%> u-ze-char-Ya-hu and Zechariah וַעֲזַרְיָ֔הוּ <S%H5838><s%> va-'a-zar-Ya-hu, and Azariah וּמִיכָאֵ֖ל <S%H4317><s%> u-mi-cha-'El and Michael וּשְׁפַטְיָ֑הוּ <S%H8203><s%> u-she-fat-Ya-hu; and Shephatiah כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All אֵ֕לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei all these [were] the sons יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <S%H3092><s%> ye-ho-sha-Fat of Jehoshaphat מֶ֥לֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten gave לָהֶ֣ם׀ <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem like אֲ֠בִיהֶם <S%H1><s%> 'A-vi-hem And their father מַתָּנ֨וֹת <S%H4979><s%> mat-ta-Not gifts רַבּ֜וֹת <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bot them great לְכֶ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> le-Che-sef of silver וּלְזָהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> u-le-za-Hav and of gold וּלְמִגְדָּנ֔וֹת <S%H4030><s%> u-le-mig-da-Not, and of precious things עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei cities מְצֻר֖וֹת <S%H4694><s%> me-tzu-Rot with fenced בִּֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> bi-hu-Dah; in Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמַּמְלָכָ֛ה <S%H4467><s%> ham-mam-la-Chah but the kingdom נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan gave לִֽיהוֹרָ֖ם <S%H3088><s%> li-ho-Ram he to Jehoram כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <S%H1060><s%> hab-be-Chor. because he [was] the firstborn פ Peh

וַיָּ֨קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom was risen up יְהוֹרָ֜ם <S%H3088><s%> ye-ho-Ram Now when Jehoram עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over מַמְלֶ֤כַת <S%H4467><s%> mam-Le-chat to the kingdom אָבִיו֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv of his father וַיִּתְחַזַּ֔ק <S%H2388><s%> vai-yit-chaz-Zak, he strengthened וַיַּהֲרֹ֥ג <S%H2026><s%> vai-ya-ha-Rog himself and slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav all his brethren בֶּחָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> be-Cha-rev; with the sword וְגַ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam also מִשָּׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> mis-sa-Rei and [divers] also of the princes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim [was] thirty וּשְׁתַּ֛יִם <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Ta-yim and two שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years יְהוֹרָ֣ם <S%H3088><s%> ye-ho-Ram Jehoram בְּמָלְכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> be-ma-le-Cho; when he began to reign וּשְׁמוֹנֶ֣ה <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Neh eight שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim, years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim. in Jerusalem

וַיֵּ֜לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech walked בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ׀ <S%H1870><s%> be-De-rech in the way מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after עָשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su like as did בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house אַחְאָ֔ב <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av, of Ahab כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- for he had the daughter אַחְאָ֔ב <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av, of Ahab הָ֥יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-ye-tah become לּ֖וֹ lo אִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah; to wife וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as and he wrought הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the eyes יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- was not אָבָ֣ה <S%H14><s%> 'a-Vah would יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Howbeit the LORD לְהַשְׁחִית֙ <S%H7843><s%> le-hash-Chit not destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, of David לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because הַבְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit, because of the covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which כָּרַ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> ka-Rat that he had made לְדָוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid; with David וְכַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ve-cha-'a-Sher which אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar, and as he promised לָתֵ֨ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet to give ל֥וֹ lo נִ֛יר <S%H5216><s%> nir a light וּלְבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> u-le-va-Nav to him and to his sons כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim. for ever

בְּיָמָיו֙ <S%H3117><s%> be-ya-Mav In his days פָּשַׁ֣ע <S%H6586><s%> pa-Sha' revolted אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> e-Dom, the Edomites מִתַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat Thahash יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> yad- from under the dominion יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah וַיַּמְלִ֥יכוּ <S%H4427><s%> vai-yam-Li-chu and made עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem over מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech. themselves a king

וַיַּֽעֲבֹ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'a-Vor went forth יְהוֹרָם֙ <S%H3088><s%> ye-ho-Ram Then Jehoram עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with שָׂרָ֔יו <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rav, with his princes וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הָרֶ֖כֶב <S%H7393><s%> ha-Re-chev and all his chariots עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo; with וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become קָ֣ם <S%H6965><s%> kam with him and he rose up לַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> Lay-lah, by night וַיַּ֗ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vai-Yach, and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱדוֹם֙ <S%H123><s%> 'e-dOm the Edomites הַסּוֹבֵ֣ב <S%H5437><s%> has-so-Vev which compassed him in אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, about וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei and the captains הָרָֽכֶב׃ <S%H7393><s%> ha-Ra-chev. of the chariots

וַיִּפְשַׁ֨ע <S%H6586><s%> vai-yif-Sha' revolted אֱד֜וֹם <S%H123><s%> e-Dom So the Edomites מִתַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat Thahash יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> yad- from under the hand יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, to this אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> 'az Then תִּפְשַׁ֥ע <S%H6586><s%> tif-Sha' revolt לִבְנָ֛ה <S%H3841><s%> liv-Nah [also] did Libnah בָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et The same time הַהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi the same מִתַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat Thahash יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do; from under his hand כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because עָזַ֔ב <S%H5800><s%> 'a-Zav, because he had forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tav. of his fathers

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- Moreover ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he עָשָֽׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-sah- Moreover he made בָמ֖וֹת <S%H1116><s%> va-Mot high places בְּהָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> be-ha-Rei in the mountains יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah וַיֶּ֙זֶן֙ <S%H2181><s%> vai-Ye-zen to commit fornication אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei and caused the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem וַיַּדַּ֖ח <S%H5080><s%> vai-yad-Dach and compelled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. Judah פ Peh

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo And there came אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav then מִכְתָּ֔ב <S%H4385><s%> mich-Tav, a writing מֵֽאֵלִיָּ֥הוּ <S%H452><s%> me-'e-li-Ya-hu to him from Elijah הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi the prophet לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying כֹּ֣ה׀ <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid of David אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha, thy father תַּ֗חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat, Thahash אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not הָלַ֙כְתָּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Lach-ta Because thou hast not walked בְּדַרְכֵי֙ <S%H1870><s%> be-dar-Chei in the ways יְהוֹשָׁפָ֣ט <S%H3092><s%> ye-ho-sha-Fat of Jehoshaphat אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha, thy father וּבְדַרְכֵ֖י <S%H1870><s%> u-ve-dar-Chei nor in the ways אָסָ֥א <S%H609><s%> 'a-Sa of Asa מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh will the LORD נֹגֵ֛ף <S%H5062><s%> no-Gef smite מַגֵּפָ֥ה <S%H4046><s%> mag-ge-Fah plague גְדוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah Behold with a great בְּעַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> be-'am-Me-cha; thy people וּבְבָנֶ֥יךָ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-va-Nei-cha and thy children וּבְנָשֶׁ֖יךָ <S%H802><s%> u-ve-na-Shei-cha and thy wives וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol and all רְכוּשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H7399><s%> re-chu-She-cha. and all thy goods
